entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI-B Survey. Popular opinion about the Hungarian telephone situation.

entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-C19: TÁRKI-B Survey. Popular opinion about the Hungarian telephone situation.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19

entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: data on the use of the telephone, local and long-distance calls, telephone bill, opinion on the tariff and the raising of fees, new services, the way of getting a telephone, the connection between computer and telephone, the equipment of household, telephone calls at work: local and long-distance calls, livelihood, personal data, school, workplace, membership in organizations, similar data of the spouse, data on the household members, dwelling, material goods
entry.dcterms:subject: family life, marriage, relationship
housing
business/industrial management and organisation
education, school
consumption/consumer behavior
mass media
economic conditions and indicators
person
survey data
cross-section
A random sample drawn from the telephone directory; 1000 telephone subscribers.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
